content: A new room will be created and the PDF form will be copied there. You can then invite other users to fill out the form in the room.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the content of a modal dialog that explains how a shared PDF form will be handled after being shared. The description appears in a modal dialog when inviting users to fill out a form and indicates where the form will be copied and made accessible to others.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'köçürüləcək' (moved) is not the best fit for 'copied'. 'Nüsxəsinin yaradılacaq' or 'dugası alınacaq' would be more accurate for 'copied'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yeni otaq yaradılacaq və PDF formasının nüsxəsinin yaradılacaq. Daha sonra digər istifadəçiləri otaqdakı formanı doldurmağa dəvət edə bilərsiniz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'You can then invite...' sounds a bit abrupt and less natural in Spanish. A more polite and formal phrasing would improve the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se creará una nueva sala y allí se copiará el formulario PDF. Luego, podrá invitar a otros usuarios a rellenar el formulario en la sala.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "A new room will be created" is overly literal. While not strictly incorrect, a more natural phrasing would improve readability. "A new room will be established" or "A new space will be created" might be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຫ້ອງໃບ່ຈະຖືກສ້າງຕັ້ງຂຶ້ນ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'copy' is translated quite literally. While understandable, a slightly more nuanced translation relating to the action performed on the form could be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ແບບຟອມ PDF ຈະຖືກນໍາ້ມາໃຊ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A new room will be created" is translated as "නව කාමරයක් නිර්මාණය කර" which is literal. A more natural Sinhala phrasing would be something like "නව කාමරයක් සාදා ගන්නා ලැබේ" or "නව කාමරයක් ඇති කරනු ලැබේ".

The English phrase "copied there" is translated as "එහි පිටපත් කරනු ලැබේ." While technically correct, a more idiomatic translation would be "ඔහුට පිටපත් කරනු ලැබේ" or something similar.  The current wording is slightly awkward.
The English phrase "invite other users" is translated as "වෙනත් පරිශීලකයින්ට ආරාධනා කළ හැකිය". While correct, a more natural phrasing could be "අනෙකුත් පරිශීලකයින්ට ආරාධනා කළ හැකිය"
The word 'PDF' is unnecessarily capitalized in the Slovenian translation. It should match the English and be lowercase.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustvarila se bo nova soba in vanjo bo kopiran pdf obrazec.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of 'povabiš' (informal you) might not be appropriate depending on the overall tone of the application. Consider using the formal 'povabite'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ustvarila se bo nova soba in vanjo bo kopiran pdf obrazec. Nato lahko povabite druge uporabnike, da izpolnijo obrazec v sobi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'A new room will be created' is translated as 'Нова просторија ће бити креирана'. While technically correct, a more natural translation would be 'Изазоваће се нова просторија' or 'Креираће се нова просторија'. The current translation sounds a little clunky in Serbian.

The English phrase 'You can then invite other users' is translated as 'Затим можете позвати друге кориснике'. While understandable, 'Затим можете додати друге кориснике' might be a more fitting translation, as it aligns better with the context of inviting users to a room in a digital platform.

The term 'prostorija' while technically meaning 'room', sounds awkward in this context. 'Soobćenje' or 'Prostor' would be more appropriate to convey the concept of a collaborative space or room for sharing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nova prostor će biti kreirana i PDF formular će biti tamo kopiran. Zatim možete pozvati druge korisnike da popune formular u prostor.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'tamo kopiran' is a bit clunky. It could be more naturally phrased as 'biće kopiran tamo' or simply 'kopiran'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nova prostor će biti kreirana i PDF formular će biti kopiran tamo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "PDF-форму" is a direct transliteration. It would be more natural in Ukrainian to use a more integrated form like "PDF форму" or "форму PDF".
While not strictly incorrect, the use of "Після цього" sounds slightly formal. A more conversational alternative might be more suitable.
